modName: Daedric Armor RE Texture Chest Only
summary: Daedric Armor Texture V1 and now V2
descriptionHtml:
============================================================================================
Daedric Armor Texture V1 and now V2
=========================================================================================
How do I install this? (Skip if you know how) ***DO NOT USE NEXUS MOD MANAGER***

Well if you don\'t know how to install this its quite simple.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Steam Users:                                         (Skip if you Pirated the game)

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data

Once there just place the folder there ***MAKE SURE IT IS THERE***               
**NOTE**
When i made this and tested it I found out if its in the wrong directory it wont work (Wrong Directory Means Misspelled Words)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hacked/Torrent Users:

 **I DO NOT ENDORSE TORRENTS/PIRATED GAMES**

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data
or
C:\\Program Files(x86)\\Bethesda Softworks\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
C:\\Program Files\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data
or
C:\\Program Files\\Bethesda Softworks\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data

Once there just place the folder there ***MAKE SURE IT IS THERE***               
**NOTE**
When i made this and tested it I found out if its in the wrong directory it wont work (Wrong Directory Means Misspelled Words)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Again, Please spread this mod by:

Get at least 10 Endorsements

50 Support Comments

Or you can help me out by spreading this mod or even making a video on it.
=========================================================================================
Please Support Me This Is My First Mod.
=========================================================================================
EDIT: Guys please stop say how do you know the Pirated directory? Look in the discussion, I explained and I am adding some new possible directory\'s.
=========================================================================================
author: Dg1rls742
